thread.section_title: Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Shop to you drop
thread.title_full: Shop to you drop - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sharon A
title: Shop to you drop
text:
My husband and I stayed here on November last year for Black Friday sales. Hotel was clean, staff were friendly, rooms were big and bed comfy, great location easy reach for all attractions, bar was expensive.
On the whole it looked a good deal as you got 10 dollars free daily for a tuck shop, and free wine every day from 4pm - 5pm It should be noted that you were charged a facility fee as well as taxed on your supposed free daily 10 dollars.
Room Tip: Ask for room with a view or you end up looking at brick wall See more room tips
